AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: defendant and appellant in an alien transportation case, convicted of several offenses and sentenced to 41 months' imprisonment, traveled with co-defendant Zeba Williams from Houston to San Antonio and then to Laredo
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: individual allegedly transporting aliens with McMillon, drove the tractor-trailer, co-conspirator, testified at sentencing that McMillon did not recruit her to commit the offenses and that they entered a joint partnership to smuggle aliens, gave consent to open the door during the checkpoint stop, asked McMillon to accompany him in a tractor-trailer to Laredo
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon and Zeba Williams: pair who traveled together from Houston to San Antonio and then to Laredo, questioned by Agent Pena at an immigration checkpoint, defendants in the case who requested continuances to file pretrial motions, entered a joint partnership to smuggle aliens
